projectGridLines.title: Title: Simulations, Signal processing algorithms and Architecture for a Maritime SAR Satellite
projectGridLines.description:
Title: Simulations, Signal processing algorithms and Architecture for a Maritime SAR Satellite

Description: Developing simulations for modelling operations of a SAR+AIS satellite

Skill sets: Digital Signal Processing, Communication Systems, Electrodynamics

Traits expectation: -

Expected learning: Understanding operations of different SAR modes

Specific courses required for project execution: Digital Signal processing
